EmailTemplate.name: VinWorx Spring KC Registration Now Available
EmailTemplate.subject: VinWorx Spring Kansas City 2013 April 15th- 17th: Spots are Filling Fast!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Dates have been set for VinWorx this fall in Kansas City, April 15th- 17th! Register today as spots are filling fast for this invaluable training and networking event. Sign up today for only $499 to participate in this exciting program! It would be great to have your dealership in attendance.
Click here for more information! - http://vinsolutions.com/vinworx/index.html
*** Get certified on 3 levels in just 2 days! ***
Who is Attending? Admin Users Seeking Certification Admin Users Seeking Cert. Refresh Advanced Admin Users
Train: Workshops hosted at the historic downtown Marriot Hotel
Network: Welcome Reception at the Metropolitan KC Restaurant
Relax: Brews and BBQ! Enjoy a tour and tasting at Boulevard Brewery
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/ You and your dealership will be happy you did! Please contact pamela.lasley@vinsolutions.com for more information.
OUR MISSION: VinSolutions is committed to provide training in a variety of formats throughout multiple venues to enhance the learning experience. Certified MotoSnap VinPros ensure that all participants are able to fully understand and operate the system effectively both during and after implementation through practical application and open communication to develop genuine partnerships with our valuable users.
